import React from 'react' import { nanoid } from 'nanoid' export default function Domanda(props){ console.log(props) const styles = { backgroundColor : props.isHeld ? ' green' : '#FFF'} const [oli , setoli] = React.useState(getValueHtml()) function getValueArray(){ return {id:nanoid() , isHeld:false} } function getValueHtml(){ const newValue = [] for(let i = 0 ; i < props.value.lenght; i++){ newValue.push(getValueArray()) } } console.log(oli) return (

{oli.value}

{props.value}

{props.value}

{props.value}

) }
